title: Start
body:
<<changeFont Lance inCharacter>> <<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>> I'm Arannis Shadowfall! Fear my superior dex bonuses! <<changeFont Lance outOfCharacter>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>> <<overridePose Ruby plusTwo>> Oh my God, it’s so good to you! It’s been ages! <<returnToDefaultPose Ruby>>
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>> One sec!
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>> It’s open!
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>> Brynn!
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>> About three days ago, jet lag and all.
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>> You should’ve told me you were coming! I would’ve picked you up from the airport, you know?
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>> Yeah, I know, but I wanted to surprise you guys.
<<activateNeutralPortrait Ruby>> But I would’ve made a sign!
<<activateNeutralPortrait Lance>> No worries, Ruby. I’m just glad to be back.
